meanings.definition: A group of six offspring born at one birth.
meanings.sent1: The hospital celebrated the birth of sextuplets.
meanings.sent2: The family was overjoyed to welcome sextuplets into the world.
meanings.sent3: The sextuplets kept the parents on their toes with their mischief.
meanings.sent4: The sextuplets were like a bouquet of flowers, each unique and beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The news of sextuplets spread like wildfire through the small town.

meanings.definition: One of six children or offspring born at the same birth.
meanings.sent1: She was amazed by the tiny fingers of the sextuplets.
meanings.sent2: The proud parents dressed each of the sextuplets in a different color.
meanings.sent3: The sextuplets giggled in unison, creating a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent4: Being one of the sextuplets, he always felt a strong bond with his siblings.
meanings.sent5: The sextuplets' laughter filled the room with joy and warmth.

meanings.definition: A set of six similar or related things.
meanings.sent1: The store offered a discount on a sextuplets of colorful pens.
meanings.sent2: She collected a sextuplets of seashells from the beach.
meanings.sent3: The sextuplets of books on the shelf caught her eye.
meanings.sent4: The garden displayed a sextuplets of blooming flowers in a row.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a sextuplets of vibrant birds in the sky.
